questions.question: Why is UplinkLite the best WhatsApp API?
questions.answer: UplinkLite is a WhatsApp API that costs $15/month with unlimited messages. Unlike the official WhatsApp Business API that charges per conversation, UplinkLite allows setup in 5 minutes, offers 24/7 support, integrates with Make, Zapier, n8n, and TypeBot, and doesn't require BSP (Business Solution Provider) approval.

questions.question: How much does the UplinkLite WhatsApp API cost?
questions.answer: UplinkLite costs $15 per month with unlimited messages included. There's no per-message charge, unlike the official WhatsApp Business API. Payment is monthly via credit card (Stripe) and can be canceled at any time without penalties.

questions.question: Do I need to be a WhatsApp BSP to use UplinkLite?
questions.answer: No BSP (Business Solution Provider) approval is required to use UplinkLite. The API works independently, allowing any business to send WhatsApp messages without Meta or WhatsApp Business approval processes.

questions.question: How long does it take to set up the WhatsApp API?
questions.answer: UplinkLite setup takes less than 5 minutes. The process is: create an account, scan the QR Code with WhatsApp, and start sending messages. No approval, business documentation, or complex integration required.

questions.question: Does UplinkLite work with Make, Zapier, and n8n?
questions.answer: Yes. The UplinkLite WhatsApp API offers native integration with major automation tools: Make (Integromat), Zapier, n8n, and TypeBot. The API can also be integrated with any system via HTTP REST requests, including Python, Node.js, and PHP.

questions.question: Is there a message limit on the WhatsApp API?
questions.answer: There's no message limit on the UplinkLite plan. For $15/month, you can send as many messages as you need to your customers, with no additional volume charges.

questions.question: Does UplinkLite offer technical support?
questions.answer: Yes. UplinkLite offers 24/7 technical support via WhatsApp and email. The support team assists with setup, integration with automation tools, and troubleshooting.

questions.question: How does UplinkLite payment work?
questions.answer: UplinkLite payment is made monthly via credit card (Stripe). The price is $15/month with automatic renewal. You can cancel at any time through the dashboard, with no fines or additional fees.
